Package game

Class JurassicParkLocation

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Location
game.JurassicParkLocation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
public class JurassicParkLocation
extends Location
An extended version of the original location, to suit the JurassicPark's game needs.
Since:
25/04/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
NgYuKang

  • Constructor Details

    • JurassicParkLocation

      public JurassicParkLocation​(GameMap map, int x, int y)
      Constructor.

      Locations know which map they are part of, and where.

      Parameters:
      map - the map that contains this location
      x - x coordinate of this location within the map
      y - y coordinate of this location within the map

  • Method Details

    • checkBushGrowth

      protected void checkBushGrowth()
      Used to check if a bush can grow in the current location.

    • checkBushDeath

      private void checkBushDeath()
      Used to check if a bush will die.

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Called every turn to give the location and anything on it to inform them the passage of time. In this JurassicPark version of location, we will check if there's a chance for a bush to grow, or chance of Brachiosaur killing a bush.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Location
